website_summaries.verdict: The new cool brand in town, these sunglasses are effortless with their laid-back yet high-quality look.
pros: Dress up a casual look or add a stylish, surfer accessory to black-tie attire
These sunglasses block out the sun with UV400 polarization
Flattering on most face shapes, as well
cons: While the overall look and feel is stellar for this price point, some may feel the need to constantly adjust

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses, Even Better Service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered over a 100 pairs to give out as customized gifts. The feedback was incredible, everyone loved them. As great as the glasses are, I believe the customer service is even better. They were super easy to work with and very accommodating of my circumstances. Will definitely be ordering more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Boyant no, cool, yes.
customer_reviews.text: I get comments from everyone on these on their super sweet style. Whenever people try them on their first comment is how light they are and how they can't believe that they are made with real wood....FYI I totally thought they would float and bragged that they would so tested to prove in a cooler of ice water, I was wrong, buuut, the frames really cooled my face down after I put them on after the "test"....so I guess that's a bonus, right?
customer_reviews.author: awesome sauce

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Great Looking.
customer_reviews.text: I gave these sunglasses to my husband for Christmas. He's fussy about the shapes of his sunglasses. I was hesitant to buy these for that reason. To my surprise, he LOVES them. He uses the case to keep them from scratching. The case is beautiful. It comes with a cleaning cloth too. The quality is very good. The wood tones are vibrant and they're stylish. I would highly recommend them. May have to get a pair for me.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyTop

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these for me because i had a pair of Vans wooden-LOOKING (made of some kind of plastic) sunglasses that just broke in my backpack mysteriously. They come in a nice bamboo type case that is not too big. I have dropped them twice now (luckily not on the lenses both times) and I can't even tell where they hit.
customer_reviews.author: GarbloJones

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses about a month before this writing. The quality is great, and they look sharp. Received a few complements the first day I wore them out to the beach! I did have the misfortune of breaking them on the second weekend I had them while out sailing, and as such I can assure you that these frames are indeed real wood. The arm came out looking like kindling! Anyhow, I contacted the seller hoping to be able to get a discount replacement pair, but they sent me a free replacement since they were purchased within 30 days of me contacting them... I was super excited about that. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, genuine wood, just a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in the mail today and as far as I can tell, they’re high quality! Definitely genuine wood, and the lenses are a lot more tinted than I expected, making it easier to see when it’s really bright out. One thing that I didn’t anticipate however is the size of the glasses. I expected them to be average, but the lenses themselves are pretty big. I’m 19 years old and I know that’s kinda the trend to have bigger lenses, but I personally prefer smaller glasses. Although they are bigger than I like, they’re still super good glasses so I’m still giving them a 5, just be certain that you like larger lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses for a forester
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a Christmas present for my husband, so they have not yet been used. However, as a buyer, I was thrilled with them. My husband was a forester for over 30 years before he retired, so the wooden glasses are sure to be a big hit with him as well as a lovely surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Weller

customer_reviews.title: Glad we purchased these beautiful sandalwood sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Sandalwood sunglasses as a gift for our son. They looked and felt fabulous. Our son really liked them as well. The lenses are polarized and dark grey which looks really sharp with the wood color. They appear to be high quality and well made.
customer_reviews.author: RickRedmond

customer_reviews.title: best of the cheap wooden wayfarers
customer_reviews.text: great glasses. definitely the best of any cheaper wooden ones, super clear lenses. etched 'handmande', im skeptical, but 5 stars for sure
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ateenager's summer water fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift to my Godson,his family lives on Lake Erie-so I thought a pair of sunglass's that float=will be good for the whole upcoming summer!He sure likes these & the wood watch to match!
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey a hindmarsh

customer_reviews.title: Great freaking gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Xmas gift, but I took them out tried them on and they look awesome. So people say they break, well they are wood and light weight. Be careful, nothings perfect. I love them and I'm sure my man will too. PS. The seller is great, contact with any issue, and they help you out asap.
customer_reviews.author: Haze Marie

customer_reviews.title: Classy but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous looking genuine wood sunglasses. I get compliments. Comfortable to wear and decent lenses for the price. I’ve had them a month and they have broken. They were in a non-crushproof case in a jacket pocket when it happened, so I’ll chalk this one up to “user carelessness”. They are fragile particularly across the grain of the wood. If it weren’t for the lightning deal I saw when considering replacing them (I’ve glued them, but I’m missing a small chunk) I probably would try another different bamboo pair with which I’ve had luck. I’ll try again with these and a crushproof case and see how I make out.
customer_reviews.author: johninde

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hot girls complement you when you're waiting in line at 7-eleven.
customer_reviews.author: Taka

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Didn't take long to break. I didn't drop them or crush them to my knowledge. I had them hanging from my shirt collar and when I went to put them on i noticed the frame above the left eye had cracked clean through along a wood grain. I tried wood gluing and clamping them but that didn't last more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These looked nice at first, although they run a little wide for petite faces. However, first the little silver "Ray Bay"-like do dads on the side fell out and then they broke clean in the middle. I super glued them back together and they are OK as emergency sunglasses. Neat idea but need to be sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Waldrip

customer_reviews.title: thwy are nice and people often ask where did I get them ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sun glasses because I have a watch with the same type of wood..thwy are nice and people often ask where did I get them from..keep making nice shades..
customer_reviews.author: Cedric B.

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I just received my sunglasses and so far so good! These are the first pair of polarized sunglasses and the difference is obvious. On top of the polarization and the UV protection, they look and feel amazing! They are light weight and sturdy. An added plus, the case that comes with it is pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: David Smilnak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these glasses for my husband who was very pleased! They are very stylish and light-weight. Excellent craftsmanship! He said they are very comfortable and the lenses are super clear. I would definitely purchase from this company again in the future! Loved the wood case that stores the glasses...so cool!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses for my boyfriend for Christmas. I was nervous they wouldn't be his style or wouldn't look right on him, but we both LOVED them! They are so unique and look great on. Great quality and nice packaging too. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the glasses and they shipped quickly and I didn't have to wait long for rhem to be delivered. The case that they came in is beautifully crafted as are the glasses, the wood looks great. The sunglasses look amazing (: I would definitely suggest buying a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They look cool, are as advertised, and arrived on time and hassle free!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Roe

customer_reviews.title: Break easily
customer_reviews.text: I got to wear these sunglasses for about one week before they fell and instantly broke. It wasn't a long fall, maybe 3 feet. They had been folded onto my t-shirt and fell after I bent over. The hinge came right out of the wood. As my friend described it, they broke like a cheap pair of sunglasses would. Unfortunately, they weren't a free promotional item. I spent enough money on them that they should have lasted much longer.
customer_reviews.author: C. K. Over

customer_reviews.title: These glasses look great, but the frame cracked after about 30 days ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look great, but the frame cracked after about 30 days of use (and they were never dropped). Very disappointed in the quality. Update: I contacted customer service and they responded immediately and sent a new pair - so far, so good :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my boyfriend. He loves them and wears them daily now. Says they feel light, smooth and don't squeeze his head. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Great! I'm very happy with this item, is a gift for a special person!!!
customer_reviews.author: OzzieVald

customer_reviews.title: Cool Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They're comfortable, inexpensive and really stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Hasan J. Esteaneh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my Husbands birthday! Just days before he broke a cheaper pair of wooden glasses from Amazon, so I got him these... My husband said these were a little heavier & more sturdy, but not uncomfortably heavy. Just obviously better quality! Very happy with them!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mykala Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Sure to become your go to!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these sunglasses. They have become my everyday wear. They look amazing and are comfortable to wear! Durability is a plus; I've dropped them off my head when bending over and dropped them out of my truck while taking my review photos, and they held up!
customer_reviews.author: Leach

customer_reviews.title: In love with this
customer_reviews.text: I'm really in love this sunglasses they are very detailed and lightweight, and I fell awesome because anyone in my country have wood sunglasses so while all people wearing ray Ban and another plástic glasses Im the only with this awesome and original sunglasses that give me a lot of style
customer_reviews.author: Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice glasses the only reason for the 4 stars was because they fit my husband a little small for his face. But overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Xiomarra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Nope, not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for my partner. Not only was it a used item, characterized by the fingerprints on the lenses and a return shipping label addressed from someone else in the box, but it was also very light and felt incredibly cheap for what it was worth. The first time my partner wore the sunglasses they slipped off his head and broke in several places: the frame of one eye piece and at the hinge of one ear piece. They’re cute and “fashionable” but they are not at all durable or very well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift, fantastic buy, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband to match a wooden watch I bought him, and he ABSOLUTELY loves it, and gets so many complements on both his sunglasses and watch. Everyone wants one when they see his, lol.
customer_reviews.author: MckyD’z

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shades
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for something different and I found these great Glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amp count

customer_reviews.title: You need these sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest and most unique sunglasses I have ever owned! They are awesome... I get lots of compliments on them. The case is very helpful and keeps them protected. It came with a cloth too so they are always clean. Great attention to detail!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair because I loved them so much! Unfortunately my first pair broke which is understandable because they are made of wood. The only thing is that they changed their packaging. I’m not mad but the first packaging was great because it was a glass case. This time it was a box that you can’t really reuse as a glass case. All around great sun glasses and look awesome
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Day

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses, Incredibly Fragile
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses looked great out of the packaging and were comfortable to wear. The polarized lenses did a great job allowed me to better enjoy the outdoors. However, the frame broke within a couple weeks of use. The frame supporting the left lens fractured in two places, and the lens has fallen out. The temple frame seemed to have applied to much pressure to the hinge joint resulting in the splitting of the wood of the rim. Would have rated 5 stars if the sunglasses had not fallen apart after such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sunglasses! They are comfortable, super cute, and I get compliments all the time! My problem is that they break. This is my third pair. My first pair was a gift and I after they broke I bought myself a new pair. That pair broke after only wearing them for a week. I returned them and was sent a new pair and now after less than three months they have broken again. I always keep them in my car or purse when I am not wearing them. Sadly I don't think I will be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Briawna Willingham

customer_reviews.title: I had these expensive wooden glasses called Cape Codders that ...
customer_reviews.text: I had these expensive wooden glasses called Cape Codders that were warranted for life. Then the company must have folded or something because they didn't reply to any of my inquiries on the warranty. These were a cheap replacement and look the exact same!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Super cool but break easily
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband and he absolutely loved them. He got compliments everywhere he went. They look super cool, beautiful color wood and good lenses but the wood actually snapped on the front of the glasses and broke at the hinge- he taped them and continued to wear them because he loved them so much. They were wonky on his face from the break so I ordered him a new pair but within 2 months the second pair did the same thing. I will post pics when I find where he put them.
customer_reviews.author: A.Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice until they broke
customer_reviews.text: I had much trouble with one temple piece that was very loose. I tried screwing it tighter, but it eventually came off and I tried super gluing it back, but the screw wouldn't go back in. Will try customer service. Classy looking, though.
customer_reviews.author: Feed Man

customer_reviews.title: Sunglasses look great, have great lenses. Comes in a nice case
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten a lot of compliments on these glasses. A lot of the other wooden glasses you see don't have polarized lenses like these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them. People talk of durability but seem as ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. People talk of durability but seem as strong as any plastic sunglasses I have had. They are not titanium but would take the same damage as most sunglasses I have had in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: volambre

customer_reviews.title: Different, cool and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these sunglasses and they're also comfortable to wear and the polarized lenses are great to look through, it does not make you strain your eyes like some other glasses do, also I've got a lot compliments, people find it really cool when they find out they're made of wood, so far they exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: David ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful real wood frames. Have got lots of people asking about them. Lenses are clear and have stood up well after a few month with them. Customer service was super nice....way beyond what I would expect since I wanted to exchange for a new color. Thank you, I'm enjoying them
customer_reviews.author: greg doglio

customer_reviews.title: A W E S O M E
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these sunglasses. The lenses are great, the sandalwood is beautiful, and the quality outstanding! Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.author: TCDSoCal

customer_reviews.title: They Look and Feel Like Real Wood
customer_reviews.text: These just arrived as part of a gift, and they look great! I can't say anything about the quality yet, however they definitely look and feel like real wood, which is what I was hoping for. Five stars for now!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Products/people second to none
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and intact. I love the glasses and watch- many compliments on both everywhere I go. Don’t hesitate- buy these above any of the other wooden watches or shades! I plan on buying gifts and other products for myself from Viable Harvest in the future. Awesome products and even better company that are set apart by: excellent customer service and great quality renewable goods. Cheers🍺
customer_reviews.author: John & Casey Whited

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t looked into water so do not know how good they are with that
customer_reviews.text: Lenses are very clear. Haven’t looked into water so do not know how good they are with that. Very comfortable and lightweight. Like that arms bend outward to make putting them on, taking them off nice and easy.
customer_reviews.author: nevermore

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile to be practical. Lasted 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Really bummed out about these. They were a gift to my husband. They are 3 days out of the return window and today the wooden part around the lens cracked. There wasn't an impact, and no impact shows, the construction if the wood just failed. And now I can't return or exchange for him. Planned obsolescence? Just really disappointed by this :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent company
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses are one of three products that I have bought from this company and I have been impressed with all three items my boyfriend really love these glasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These glasses have a great look and feel if you are trying to stand ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses have a great look and feel if you are trying to stand out from the typical sunglasses crowd. The frames are lightweight, but sturdy. You can feel the wood texture everytime you grab them. The shading and polarization are a great value too. These aren't your indestructible set of Oakley's though, so I only wear them when I know I'm not planning on doing anything active.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Guico

customer_reviews.title: My husband liked these glasses
customer_reviews.text: My husband liked these glasses. Debated on 5 stars but the style needs to be updated a little. Otherwise, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MB Mancuso

customer_reviews.title: The are good sunglasses. But I break them for sport.
customer_reviews.text: I've broken 3 pairs of these sunglasses but I keep buying them again. Here's a pro tip: do not have them on your person if you are moving large objects! You will snap these babies like a toothpick! However if you put them on your head and just place them on a table in all non-head related tasks you will be fine. Nice glasses good sun blocking and they just look great!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kostelecky

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a Christmas present for my boyfriend, we have our Christmas early because we travel to Texas and taking all the presents is too much, and he absolutely LOVED them! They’re great quality and I definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Paige

customer_reviews.title: Too big from my little head
customer_reviews.text: They look great on my friend that has a bigger noggin and face, but they look too big and weird on my little head. Constructed well and are beautiful, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cjdob

customer_reviews.title: Loved them till the end
customer_reviews.text: I loved my glasses they where lightweight and fit great pluse everyone liked them. Ive had them for about 2 weeks now. Sad to say they fell off my head on to my kitchen floor and broke. So im going to end up buying another pair because i liked them so much. Hopefully these one's wont break on me so easley.
customer_reviews.author: John Pina

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: These feel amazing on my face and look great. I usually spend a lot more on sunglasses but I took a chance on these because of the what they are made of and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous on or off your face.
customer_reviews.text: Usually when it comes to objects made from wood they tend be quite heavy and clumsy, these glasses are incredibly lightweight and well balanced.quality build and beautiful craftsmanship were my top two cryteria both were greatly exceeded. Without a doubt my favorite sunglasses I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These shades are fantastic! High quality, look great, and are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn fenk

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit/design
customer_reviews.text: Horribly fits head/face. Too wide and clunky. Also, cheaply non-symmetrical w/ one arm angled differently than the other. Missed my return window of time through amazon during move... what a waste of $40.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C Turner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses but did not last
customer_reviews.text: Great design, wood feels like good quality, and were comfortable. However, after just one month of use they broke. Not sure how since I only used them while I was driving and kept them in the case when I was not using them. So they weren't mistreated or anything like that. The wood split where the right side screw is. I was disappointed when I saw that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Price is better for the quality provided than any local product I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second and third pair of these that I have ordered. One is a replacement and the other is a gift. These glasses are first rate quality and the wood rims are different than any I have ever seen. My assessment of their quality is reflected in the fact that I ordered a second pair and bought another pair as a gift. Price is better for the quality provided than any local product I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Parker

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses. We found the frames to be large ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses. We found the frames to be large - fro both my husband and brother-in-law.... so keep that in mind. Otherwise nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TAP

customer_reviews.title: The stylish frames are also fun and light
customer_reviews.text: Full UV protection keeps my vision looking clear! The stylish frames are also fun and light!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Richards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great look, and the build quality is much better than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Win!
customer_reviews.text: My husband just opened both pair of sunglasses and is simply amazed by them. He had been looking for a wooden pair these are a win with polarized lenses, flexible legs and lightweight there is no much else to think about! Awesome product, look no further these are the ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quality is fantastic.. style and packaging totally unique. Buying a few more as holiday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband's birthday. He loves them. They are durable for sure and the color is exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my husband for his birthday and he loved it! Very well made and came in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday and he loved it! Very well made and came in a super cool wood case with a cloth to clean the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: holly ewing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are very well made and love the look! Worth the buy, very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: SarahMRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product and the product packaging was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product and the product packaging was perfect. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my son and he loved it. I will be buying more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee M.

customer_reviews.title: The sunglasses look really good but they are not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Hi, when I received the sunglases I was very happy because I really liked.The glass were a little bit dark, but it is ok. BUT, I had these for I few months and they just broke. The sunglasses look really good but they are not good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Efren Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have bought my husband these glasses 2 years ago and he got so many compliments on them but sadly he lost them . I repurchased these glasses for our anniversary and they cracked at the nose 2 weeks in . You guys replaced the pair but again they snapped bridge of the nose . Very disappointed in the quality maybe a new manufacturer but not the same as original pair .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the glasses! The only thing is they feel very fragile so be careful with them!
customer_reviews.author: gwasocoh

customer_reviews.title: Won't ever need new ones.
customer_reviews.text: There very durable and easy to keep clean. I can even. Get in the pool with them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Noah lewis

customer_reviews.title: They are really nice and very light weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a christmas present. They are really nice and very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Silva

customer_reviews.title: They fit comfortably and exactly what I was looking for style wise
customer_reviews.text: They fit comfortably and exactly what I was looking for style wise. They were built well and the lens are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit loosely
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of them and the weight was fine but the fit very loosely on my face. I have a pretty big head but they still feel like they might fall off at any time. I’d love to find out from the company if they come in a smaller size or if mine are just messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa N. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: They are very lightweight and comfortable on the face
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boyfriend as a birthday gift and he loves them. They are very lightweight and comfortable on the face.
customer_reviews.author: CamiD

customer_reviews.title: Cool Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Great customer support answered my call right away with no machine! Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ian B.

customer_reviews.title: he loved it and it looks so classy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my husband, he loved it and it looks so classy! Nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish they never changed
customer_reviews.text: The first pair i received 3 or 4 years ago was the best, because the bridge between the eyes wasnt so big. I broke these last saturday by falling because my own fault. I was really bummed the new paid has a bulky bridge and im sad they dont fit me quite as flawless as the first.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: wooden carrying case with the microfiber cloth inside is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.text: these are dynamite. wooden carrying case with the microfiber cloth inside is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Zickert

customer_reviews.title: I'm different
customer_reviews.text: Hey I'm very satisfied with my purchase these glasses look and feel great nice charity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These wonderful sunglasses are excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These wonderful sunglasses are excellent quality. The smooth tint of the polarized lenses and the stylish handcrafted lightweight frames are well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after wearing once
customer_reviews.text: They were not very comfortable - and they broke after wearing them once. The frame literally broke around the lens. They look nice but really didn’t hold up well, never dropped or anything just sort of fell apart. Assuming it was a flawed product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget F.

customer_reviews.title: A good option
customer_reviews.text: Good sunglasses for the price. The hinges are very flexible which I don't mind but isn't what I'm used too. They have a smoother texture not like wood.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S Havens

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my son and he is very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. Purchased for my son and he is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really nice style of sunglasses I love them its totally my style

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades!!! I shopped around for wood frame sunglasses for a while. Best bang for you buck here!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! They have a classic look and are very comfortable!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and look great. We loved the case and how carefully made these are.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. Ordered them as a Christmas gift and they are exactly what I wanted

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived in an attractive balsa wood case and are nice quality. Worth the price for sure
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses arrived in an attractive balsa wood case and are nice quality. Worth the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Olson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product.
customer_reviews.text: My name is Abi and I am from Delaware, I was a bit skeptical about this product at first because it was a brand new brand to me, but after they arrived and I try them on I was convinced I made the right choice. They adjust to your face and you won’t even feel they are on.
customer_reviews.author: Abimael Famania

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and look good too. Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of these dark coloured wooden sunglasses. They fit well and look good too. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: M.D. Mallia

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues, otherwise Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Very pleased the seller worked with me very quickly to replace my flawed pair. Nice glasses, many compliments, wish they would've lasted. Broke within a month of very light usage. There was a knot in the wood of one arm that concerned me as soon as I opened the box. It simply snapped while in use. Poor quality control to release this pair for sale.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife. She absolutely loves them. They look great and are very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sunglasses, got the Sandalwood pair. They fit great and the polarized lenses are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ian D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because they were beautiful! I also liked what you stand for
customer_reviews.author: Linda Maddonni

product_meta.title: Real Solid Handmade Wooden Sunglasses for Men, Polarized Lenses with Gift Box
product_meta.description:
Tired of those old plastic sunglasses that feel cheap, clunky and heavy? Our designers at Viable Harvest have created the perfect lightweight wooden sunglasses just for you! Our sunglasses are hand crafted with organic natural wood for a unique design that looks and feels great. With sleek lines and a leisurely style, the Viable Harvest sunglasses are ideal for the backyard or your next great adventure. We love the wooden sunglasses not only for their strength but for their amazing look - an exciting and unique grain and color pattern that boasts nothing but style. They've been lightly polished to enhance their natural wooden tones and provide a stunningly smooth finish. We use premium, high quality, certified polarized lenses with a UV400 rating. We're not only concerned with how you look, but how we can help protect you for life.

The classic style is anything but boring. A universal fit and unisex design make this a great choice for our regular customers or for those trying Viable Harvest for the first time. We make all of our products from natural, eco-friendly wood, and we're confident these will look and feel great next to your skin. Going casual? No problem! Dressing it up for a day out? We've got the look for you! We've also included a custom designed gift box with a soft, microfiber cleaning cloth.

At Viable Harvest, we care about our customers. If you're not satisfied with our sunglasses, let us know. We'll do everything we can to make it right. We've got a 100% money back guarantee to boot. So go ahead and order. We've got you covered.
feature_bullets: Perfect gift for yourself or for that special someone. Another bonus? We've included a great looking bamboo gift box and microfiber cleaning cloth.
100% money back guarantee - we care about our customers. Not satisfied with our sunglasses? Let us know. We'll do our best to make it right.
Premium UV400 polarized lenses for superior clarity, color and protection. Classic design that looks great on everyone. A throwback style with a modern flair.
All natural wood sunglasses made from bamboo. Lightweight, durable and designed for your comfort.
